news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Ampd Energy's battery systems are being utilized by Singaporean developer City Developments to reduce embodied carbon in construction projects. This collaboration highlights the growing focus on sustainability in the construction industry.

properties.growth_insight_description: Ampd Energy may be growing as it has secured an innovatively structured $8 million term loan to accelerate the deployment of its energy storage systems. Additionally, the company has partnered with AJI Rentals to use its 'Enertainer' to power two tower cranes on a flagship project, indicating an expansion of its operational applications. Being a finalist in the 2022 Earthshot Prize also suggests recognition and potential for increased visibility in the industry.

about_short_description.short_description: Ampd Energy designs, engineers and manufactures state-of-the-art, grid-connected energy storage systems.

product.name: Enertainer
product.description: A battery energy storage system designed to replace diesel generators on construction sites, offering a safer and emission-free power source.

product.name: Ampd Silo
product.description: A mobile power solution that is scalable and flexible, designed for construction site requirements with a small footprint.
